name: Cloudchipr
headline: Workflow Automation for Cloud Operations
description: Cloudchipr helps engineering and finance teams save time and money by automating cloud operations. With Cloudchipr, teams can schedule different automated workflows that send Slack alerts, build Tableau charts, create Jira tickets, and deactivate unused resources across all major cloud platforms. It’s like Zapier for cloud ops.

founders.name: Ashot Ayvazyan, Founder
founders.description: Ashot is an engineer and entrepreneur with a computer science background and 14 years of experience in the design, implementation, and operations of distributed computing systems based on cloud and bare metal infrastructures. Now he is the Co-founder and CEO at Cloudchipr, which helps companies to reduce their cloud costs with infrastructure optimisation automation workflows.

founders.name: Suren Marashlyan, Founder
founders.description: Suren is a software engineer and entrepreneur with a math and computer science background. He has 10+ years of experience in computer software design and development. Now he is the Co-founder and VP of Engineering at Cloudchipr, which helps companies to reduce their cloud costs with infrastructure optimization automation workflows.

## Frequently Asked Questions
How does it work?
You connect your preferred cloud accounts to your Cloudchipr service through a ReadOnly or Read/Write IAM role, which will allow Cloudchipr to assume into the provided role and periodically collect metadata about your resources.
What kind of data Cloudchipr collects from my cloud?
We never have access or collect any sensitive data from your cloud. We collect only resource usage metrics and resource identifiers from your CloudAPI. Cloudchipr will never be able or try to gain access to your sensitive data.
What gets installed on my cloud?
An IAM role or Service account with ReadOnly or Read/Write permissions (In case you want to run a clean up as well).
How do I get started?
You can start by signing up for a free trial. Our software will then guide you through a simple process of connecting your cloud accounts, we’ll bring complete high level visualization and detailed view of your usage and saving opportunities. You can now start saving with Cloudchipr every day and be sure that you’ll not pay for idle resources ever again.
How much does Cloudchipr cost?
See [Pricing](https://cloudchipr.com/</pricing>)
How do I reach Cloudchipr if I have a question?
Join our slack community or just email us at support@cloudchipr.com and we will get back to you with an answer as soon as possible. For our Enterprise customers we have dedicated cloud engineers who are available to chat anytime.
How do I know if I can trust Cloudchipr?
We are security assessed and qualified by AWS. In addition to this we also have very strict policies that ensure your data is never exposed to anyone. All of the data is also encrypted at rest, so even our engineers do not have access to your data.

## Frequently Asked Questions
How does it work?
You connect your preferred cloud accounts to your Cloudchipr service through a ReadOnly or Read/Write IAM role, which will allow Cloudchipr to assume into the provided role and periodically collect metadata about your resources.
What kind of data Cloudchipr collects from my cloud?
We never have access or collect any sensitive data from your cloud. We collect only resource usage metrics and resource identifiers from your CloudAPI. Cloudchipr will never be able or try to gain access to your sensitive data.
What gets installed on my cloud?
An IAM role or Service account with ReadOnly or Read/Write permissions (In case you want to run a clean up as well).
How do I get started?
You can start by signing up for a free trial. Our software will then guide you through a simple process of connecting your cloud accounts, we’ll bring complete high level visualization and detailed view of your usage and saving opportunities. You can now start saving with Cloudchipr every day and be sure that you’ll not pay for idle resources ever again.
How much does Cloudchipr cost?
See Pricing⟨26⟩
How do I reach Cloudchipr if I have a question?
Join our slack community or just email us at support@cloudchipr.com and we will get back to you with an answer as soon as possible. For our Enterprise customers we have dedicated cloud engineers who are available to chat anytime.
How do I know if I can trust Cloudchipr?
We are security assessed and qualified by AWS. In addition to this we also have very strict policies that ensure your data is never exposed to anyone. All of the data is also encrypted at rest, so even our engineers do not have access to your data.
## Start in minutes and save hours
It takes minutes to set everything up and start using Cloudchipr completely risk-free. No credit card required for signup.

**Cloudchipr: Simplifying Cloud Operations through Automation**

Founded in 2022, Cloudchipr is a Y Combinator-backed startup based in Berlin, Germany, striving to save engineering and finance teams time and money with its automation platform dedicated to cloud operations. The essence of their mission is simple yet powerful: if you can automate it, you should. 

Think of Cloudchipr as the Zapier for cloud operations. It allows teams to create scheduled workflows that can send alerts via Slack, build visualizations in Tableau, generate Jira tickets, and deactivate unused resources—all across major cloud platforms. This means reduced time spent on mundane tasks and increased efficiency in managing cloud environments.

With a compact and efficient team of just 8 employees, Cloudchipr is making waves in several fields, particularly in developer tools, financial operations (FinOps), SaaS, and B2B services. The platform enables users to visualize cloud costs through real-time dashboards, explore resource usage, and implement no-code automations with ease. 

### What Can You Do with Cloudchipr?
- **Dashboards**: Track and predict your costs effortlessly.
- **Resource Explorer**: Dive into your multi-cloud costs in just a few clicks.
- **Live Management**: Manage live resources across all clouds from a unified platform.
- **Automations**: Set up no-code workflows to automate your cloud operations.
- **Collaboration Tools**: Improve teamwork with real-time communication features.

Cloudchipr caters to three main personas: FinOps teams seeking to optimize and operate cloud finances, engineering teams looking for insights and real-time automation, and leadership needing a consolidated view of cloud expenditures.

### Results that Speak for Themselves
The numbers are compelling. On average, customers save over $180,000 per month and gain back up to 200 hours of engineering time monthly. Total savings reported by users have surpassed $50 million thus far, showcasing how automating cloud operations can lead to substantial financial benefits.

### The Security Angle
In an age where data security is paramount, Cloudchipr meets enterprise-grade security compliance, follows strict data policies, and ensures that sensitive data remains outside their reach.

If you're considering a way to streamline your cloud operations, Cloudchipr provides a free trial to get you started without any financial commitment. Their website is clean and user-friendly—you can start experimenting with the platform in just a few minutes.

For anyone operating in the complex realm of cloud services, the insights, automation, and cost savings that Cloudchipr brings could redefine their operational efficiency and strategic planning. 

Need to see for yourself? Check out their site: [Cloudchipr](https://cloudchipr.com/).
